page.title: 07Craignish School, Ardfern.
page.content: Built 1861. (Capacity 39, roll 26). 2 teachers & (visiting specialists). All primary levels (5-12 yrs) & pupils previously transferred to Oban High (from'85 to Lochgilphead High School). Main school 2 classrooms,cloakroom/ toilets & dining room unit added 1976, staffroom/P.E.store unit added ('85). Only 7 children live near enough to walk to school, others by car/mini-bus and have dinner at school.Meals & milk sent from L/G/H.Swimming at Ardrishaig (20 miles). School Dr & Dentist call. Library van (ex Dunoon) each term (re- source centre there & L/G/H). Of 26 pupils (16 boys / 10 girls):- 2 families of 3 pupils at the school & 10 with brother/sister at school(5x2). P1(total 3 pupils),P2(2),P3(3),P4(8), P5(4), P6(2) & P7(4)...12 have never attended other schools, 5 have always lived in same house. Lived abroad 4.
